GAMEPLAY_CigaretteLuckyDescription.English: An unfiltered Lucky Strike cigarette. One of the rare kind.
GAMEPLAY_CigaretteLuckyDescription.French (France): Une cigarette Lucky Strike non filtrée. L'une des rares.
GAMEPLAY_CigaretteLuckyDescription.German: Eine ungefilterte Lucky Strike Zigarette. Eine der seltenen Art.
GAMEPLAY_CigaretteLuckyDescription.Japanese: フィルターなしのラッキーストライク。希少品。
GAMEPLAY_CigaretteLuckyDescription.Russian: Несортированная сигарета Lucky Strike. Редкий вид.
GAMEPLAY_CigaretteLuckyDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un cigarrillo Lucky Strike sin filtro. Un tipo raro.

GAMEPLAY_CigarettePackCamelDescription.Japanese: キャメルのパッケージ

GAMEPLAY_CigarettePackLuckyDescription.English: A pack of Lucky Strike cigarettes. One of the rare kind.
GAMEPLAY_CigarettePackLuckyDescription.French (France): Un paquet de cigarettes Lucky Strike. Une sorte rare.
GAMEPLAY_CigarettePackLuckyDescription.German: Eine Packung Lucky Strike Zigaretten. Eine seltene Art.
GAMEPLAY_CigarettePackLuckyDescription.Japanese: ラッキーストライクのパッケージ。希少品。
GAMEPLAY_CigarettePackLuckyDescription.Russian: Пачка сигарет Lucky Strike. Редкий вид.
GAMEPLAY_CigarettePackLuckyDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un paquete de cigarrillos Lucky Strike. Uno de los tipos raros.

GAMEPLAY_CigarettePackLuckySmall.Japanese: ヴィンテージ煙草のパッケージ

GAMEPLAY_CigarettePackLuckySmallDescript.English: A small vintage pack of Lucky Strike cigarettes. One of the rare kind.
GAMEPLAY_CigarettePackLuckySmallDescript.Japanese: ヴィンテージ版ラッキーストライクのパッケージ。希少品。

GAMEPLAY_CigarettePackHappinessDescripti.English: A pack of Double Happiness cigarettes.

GAMEPLAY_CigarettePackMentholDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un paquete de cigarrillos Marlboro Menthol.

GAMEPLAY_LighterDescription.English: A small flint lighter. Doesn't work, but still contains some fuel.
GAMEPLAY_LighterDescription.Japanese: 小型のフリント式ライター。壊れているがまだガスが多少残っている。
